channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: States face uncertainty as Trump administration tries to reverse SNAP food payments
item.description: States are facing uncertainty about providing full monthly benefits for a federal food program serving 42 million Americans

item.title: 19 taken to the hospital after bus overturns on a California highway
item.description: Officials in California say 19 people were taken to the hospital after a bus overturned on a California highway

item.title: Trump administration demands states 'undo' full SNAP payouts as states warn of 'catastrophic impact'
item.description: President Donald Trump's administration is demanding that states reverse full SNAP benefits issued under recent court orders

item.title: Senate takes first step toward ending the government shutdown
item.description: The Senate has taken the first step to end the government shutdown after a group of moderate Democrats agreed to proceed without a guaranteed extensio...

item.title: Judge to ponder challenge to West Virginia National Guard deployment in the nation's capital
